lead_paragraph: The former N.B.A. and Virginia star Ralph Sampson will serve two months in jail for mail fraud as part of a plea agreement approved by a federal judge yesterday. In exchange for the guilty plea, federal prosecutors dropped charges of perjury, making a false claim and making a false statement about Sampson’s finances in a child-support case.
